properties.name: Bardkish syenite, Urmia County, West Azerbaijan Province, Iran
properties.description:
Bardkish syenite, Urmia County, West Azerbaijan Province, Iran

Type: 323

Location: Iran

Bardkish peralkaline syenite is a part of Urumieh Complex. The intrusion has an area of c. 25 kmÂ².

properties.name: Saqqez granite complex, Saqqez County, Kurdistan Province, Iran
properties.description:
Saqqez granite complex, Saqqez County, Kurdistan Province, Iran

Type: 270

Location: Iran

Granite complex situated 20 km to the SE of the Saqqez city, comprises an older peralkaline granitoid and younger calc-alkaline granitoid. The peralkaline intrusion is over 12km long, up to 3 km wide and emplaced into limestones.

View on Mindat.org
